tasks.title: Học react
tasks.description: su khac nhau giua redux-thunk và redux-saga  - Component goi redux-thunk => redux-thunk thuc hien action => action => reponsive (view component => action => dispatch(redux-thunk()) => Promise => responsive) - Component goi action => redux-saga lang nghe action => genarator function (saga) tra ve Promise (view component =>action =>  yield takeLatest(taskTypes.ACTION_TASK, actionTaskSaga) =>  dispatch => Promise => responsive)  function* rootSaga() {   yield takeLatest(taskTypes.DELETE_TASK, deleteTaskSaga) }  moi 1 event se co 3 action DELETE_TASK DELETE_TASK_SUCCESS DELETE_TASK_FAILED action dau tien bao cho reducer biet sap co 1 API request DELETE_TASK neu thanh cong tra ve DELETE_TASK_SUCCESS neu that bai tra ve DELETE_TASK_FAILED
